long_description: The all-season Columbia Silver Ridge Shirt for girls features a lightweight, durable and sun-protective fabric that pulls sweat away from skin and a collar that flips up for bonus UV protection. Omni-Wick(TM) nylon fabric draws moisture away from skin to keep her dry and comfortable. Integrated Omni-Shade(TM) UPF 30 sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays so her skin stays safe no matter how long she stays outside. 2 chest pockets with flap closures keep small valuables safe. Mesh lining promotes breathability. The Columbia Silver Ridge Shirt features long sleeves that can be rolled up and secured with a tab.
short_description: The all-season Columbia Silver Ridge Shirt for girls features a lightweight, durable and sun-protective fabric that pulls sweat away from skin and a collar that flips up for bonus UV protection.
